#1 crypto wallet
The safest crypto wallet for everyone
The Toka Wallet lets you store your private keys on your card while maintaining easy access to them.
Start now
About Toka Wallet
Your phone and your card — nothing more!
Wallets allow you to sync up to three cards, so if you lose, steal, or damage your main card, you can still use your wallet.
Learn more
